scheme.title: scheme
scheme.description: Scheme to use for connecting to the host. Defaults to HTTP.

path.title: path
path.description: Path to access on the HTTP server.

HTTPGetAction.title: HTTPGetAction
HTTPGetAction.description: HTTPGetAction describes an action based on HTTP Locks requests.

path.title: path
path.description: Path of the directory on the host.

name.title: name
name.description: Name is the name of the resource.

annotations.title: annotations
annotations.description: Annotations is an unstructured key value map stored with a resource that may be set by external tools to store and retrieve arbitrary metadata.

spec.title: spec
spec.description: The specification of tasks to run.

metadata.title: metadata
metadata.description: Metadata is the metadata for the pod.

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.title: terminationGracePeriodSeconds
terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: TerminationGracePeriodSeconds is the grace period for terminating the pod.

tasks.title: tasks
tasks.description: Tasks is a list of tasks that should be run.

volumes.title: volumes
volumes.description: Volumes is a list of volumes that can be mounted by containers belonging to the pod.

semaphores.title: semaphores
semaphores.description: Semaphores is a list of semaphores that can be acquired by tasks.

env.title: env
env.description: Environment variables to set in the container or on the host

PodSpec.title: PodSpec
PodSpec.description: Task is a unit of work that should be run.

hostPort.title: hostPort
hostPort.description: The host port to route to the container port

Ports.title: Ports
Ports.description: A list of ports to expose.

initialDelaySeconds.title: initialDelaySeconds
initialDelaySeconds.description: Number of seconds after the process has started before the probe is initiated.

periodSeconds.title: periodSeconds
periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the probe.

successThreshold.title: successThreshold
successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed.

failureThreshold.title: failureThreshold
failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded.

Probe.title: Probe
Probe.description: A probe to check if the task is alive, it will be restarted if not.

port.title: port
port.description: Port number of the port to probe.

TCPSocketAction.title: TCPSocketAction
TCPSocketAction.description: TCPSocketAction describes an action based on opening a socket

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the task, must be unique

image.title: image
image.description: Either the container image to run, or a directory containing a Dockerfile. If omitted, the process runs on the host.

imagePullPolicy.title: imagePullPolicy
imagePullPolicy.description: Pull policy, e.g. Always, Never, IfNotPresent

livenessProbe.title: livenessProbe
livenessProbe.description: A probe to check if the task is alive, it will be restarted if not. If omitted, the task is assumed to be alive.

readinessProbe.title: readinessProbe
readinessProbe.description: A probe to check if the task is ready to serve requests. If omitted, the task is assumed to be ready if when the first port is open.

command.title: command
command.description: The command to run in the container or on the host. If both the image and the command are omitted, this is a noop.

args.title: args
args.description: The arguments to pass to the command

workingDir.title: workingDir
workingDir.description: The working directory in the container or on the host

user.title: user
user.description: The user to run the task as.

env.title: env
env.description: Environment variables to set in the container or on the host

volumeMounts.title: volumeMounts
volumeMounts.description: Volumes to mount in the container

watch.title: watch
watch.description: A list of files to watch for changes, and restart the task if they change

mutex.title: mutex
mutex.description: A mutex to prevent multiple tasks with the same mutex from running at the same time

semaphore.title: semaphore
semaphore.description: A semaphore to limit the number of tasks with the same semaphore that can run at the same time

dependencies.title: dependencies
dependencies.description: A list of tasks to run before this task

targets.title: targets
targets.description: A list of files this task will create. If these exist, and they're newer than the watched files, the task is skipped.

restartPolicy.title: restartPolicy
restartPolicy.description: The restart policy, e.g. Always, Never, OnFailure

Task.title: Task
Task.description: A task is a container or a command to run.

hostPath.title: hostPath
hostPath.description: HostPath represents a pre-existing file or directory on the host machine that is directly exposed to the container.

name.title: name
name.description: This must match the name of a volume.

mountPath.title: mountPath
mountPath.description: Path within the container at which the volume should be mounted.

VolumeMount.title: VolumeMount
VolumeMount.description: VolumeMount describes a mounting of a Volume within a container.
